scripts.postgres-dev: docker context use default && docker compose -f config/postgres_dev/compose.yaml up -d
scripts.dev-docker: docker context use default && docker compose -f config/dev/compose.yaml up -d --build
scripts.dev-docker-stop: docker context use default && docker compose -f config/dev/compose.yaml down
scripts.remote-deploy: docker context use remote && docker compose -f config/production/compose.yaml up -d --build
